title: Ken Burns: To Understand Vietnam, Forget Everything
description: Award-winning filmmaker Ken Burns joins Chuck Todd to talk about "The Vietnam War," his latest film produced with Lynn Novick. He talks about shedding pre-conceived notions, and about the reverberations of the war today.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
